item.title: Strategist Tom Lee says Monday's stock-market tumble was an 'overreaction'

UBS fined €75,000 for harassing two whistleblowers who exposed a tax-dodging scheme for French clients
item.description: UBS and its French subsidiary were also convicted of setting up a system of tax evasion between 2004 and 2012.

item.title: Greenland voters head to the polls as Trump pushes plan to annex strategic island

item.title: Crypto day-trader faithful find life under Trump is no paradise
item.description: Digital assets have been faring particularly poorly, in part due to disappointment that Trump’s industry policies are not living up to expectations.

item.title: Economists thought Trump would try to prevent a recession. That’s now in doubt.
